course.subject: ISDN
course.name: Plastic Recycling System
course.description: The special topic course introduces the plastic recycling system in economic, ecological, and technical aspects. The students are required to understand the classification and recycling of different kinds of plastic wastes. They will design and build the home-use plastic recycling machines - shredder, extruder, compressor and injection machine in the course. Instructorâ€™s approval is required.
